import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function Home() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const getProducts = async () => { const productRes = await axios.get( `/v2/api/${process.env.REACT_APP_API_PATH}/products/?category=炸物`, ); console.log(productRes); setProducts(productRes.data.products); }; useEffect(() => { getProducts(); }, []); return ( <>

壽司和刺身，拉麵和定食

我們的廚師們將以精湛的廚藝和用心烹調，為您呈現最道地的日式料理風味。
{products?.map((product) => { return (

{product.title}

查看料理
); })}
